titleStmt.title: Picturæ loquentes. Or Pictures drawne forth in characters VVith a poeme of a maid. By Wye Saltonstall.
titleStmt.author: Saltonstall, Wye, fl. 1630-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, and are to be sold by Tho. Slater, at his shop in the Blacke Fryars,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Pictures or characters.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
